name: Spacious Full Room in North End
description:
Private room with full bed in a 3 bedroom, 1 bathroom home. Need to move-in within first 14 days of availability.

June Homes provides fully furnished room and apartments in prime locations.

You will need to sign a membership agreement with June Homes.

The space
This chic 3 bedroom - 1 bathroom home has been creatively styled by our professional design team, and has everything you need to truly relax . Located conveniently in Boston’s North End, you’re right by tons of restaurants, shops and parks so you’ll never run out of places to explore.

The spacious living room includes a breakfast nook with seating for two, a comfy grey sofa, patterned accent rug, hard wood floors, and a Smart TV for all your home entertainment needs. The kitchen and bathroom have both been newly renovated with white cabinets and fresh tile respectively.
